group_1.textLeft: Hazuki's right...maybe we ought to@leave Kamihama...

group_1.textRight: Even if we don't do anything, there are folks@who'll continue to condemn us.
And I can't face Sae's friends or family, either...
With how weak I am, I can't even@help Kako or Felicia...
Instead of stayin' in Kamihama and@seein' them in trouble...
It's better to be so far away that I@won't even know they're in trouble...

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you sure you want to stop@working as a bodyguard...?

group_1.textRight: If we move to a new place,@we can start over.
We could try something new@instead of being bodyguards.
So for now, let's change our environment...

group_1.textLeft: If you two have already made up your minds...
We don't have to keep being bodyguards,@or stay in Kamihama...

group_1.narration: After we officially stopped being bodyguards...@We moved out of Kamihama.
We said we could try@something different in our new place,@but Hazuki was acting strangely,@sometimes staying at home all day long,@and other times going out for days@and not coming back...
We thought we were watching out for her,@but we didn't notice anything...
In order to erase our bad reputation,@which had somehow spread to our new place,@Hazuki worked hard all by herself...@...in the middle of that, she...
At that time,@if I hadn't ignored my feelings,@discussed it amongst ourselves further,@and continued our work as bodyguards,@our lives might have been different...
